Text.Page:
[Recall Order]

{@Rgn:63009} is supplying experienced soldiers with war horses. All soldiers who receive this message are to return to {@Rgn:63009}.

Consul {@LinkCreature:63#1160}

Welcome back, . We figured it’s not right to let an experienced soldier like you continue walking around on foot.

Providing those who serve the Valkyon Federation with the supplies they need is the least we can do. Wait here. I will make the necessary arrangements for you to claim your war horse.

Are you the <PCNAME> {@Creature:63#1160} mentioned? I’ve prepared a gift for you, in the stable here. You can choose from Brownie, the bay gelding; Ash, the Arcadian dapple; or Grey, the Velikan gray. They're all good breeds, and will serve you well.
